topic_summary.overview: EcoToken is a blockchain-based platform designed to incentivize environmental conservation through tokenized carbon credits and sustainability rewards.

recent_news.headline: EcoToken Partners with Carbon Credit Exchange
recent_news.snippet: EcoToken announces major partnership to expand carbon credit marketplace...

official_updates.title: EcoToken V2 Platform Launch
official_updates.snippet: We're excited to announce the launch of EcoToken V2, featuring enhanced carbon tracking and improved tokenomics...

onchain_highlights.details: 10M ECO tokens transferred to new wallet address

project_summary.summary: EcoToken is revolutionizing environmental impact measurement through blockchain technology, enabling transparent carbon credit trading and sustainability incentives.
